proposed two C - LSTMs models with four.from sentence:
Experiment - I : Recognizing Textual Entailment
Our proposed two C - LSTMs models with four stacked blocks outperform all the competitor models , which indicates that our thinner and deeper network does work effectively .

attention LSTMs.from sentence: Compared with attention LSTMs , our two models achieve comparable results to them using much fewer parameters ( nearly 1 / 5 ) .

By stacking.from sentence: By stacking C - LSTMs , the performance of them are improved significantly , and the four stacked TC - LSTMs achieve 85.1 % accuracy on this dataset .
